name: binding-band
effect: Held : Moves used by the holder that trap and damage a target for multiple turns (e.g. bind, fire spin) inflict twice their usual per-turn damage.
short_effect: Held: Doubles the per-turn damage of multi-turn trapping moves.

flavor_text.black-white: A band that increases the power of binding moves when held.
